tool_description: API that scrapes data from all NFL and MLB websites for news and updates on your favorite teams
title: mysportsnewsapi

api_list.name: Individual MLB Team News
api_list.description: Get news from your favorite MLB team!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mysportsnewsapi.p.rapidapi.com/mlb/{mlbid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mysportsnewsapi.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: MLB
api_list.description: Get news from all MLB teams!

api_list.name: Individual NFL Team News
api_list.description: Type in the name of your team! For special cases such as Washington Football Team, type in "washington". For every other team, type in the team name in lower case.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mysportsnewsapi.p.rapidapi.com/nfl/{nflid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mysportsnewsapi.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: NFL
api_list.description: Returns NFL data from all websites

import requests

url = "https://mysportsnewsapi.p.rapidapi.com/nfl"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
